::Hot Rod::

He looked at the new bot.
"Sure, I'll get you to the Cybertronian Fire. Thats are ship, and acting
base. Vehical mode." He says, transforming, and opening his cockpit, so
Siver Sting can get in.

::DrillBit::

He looked at the pods comp. It said "no life forms found".
"No! Damn it!" He says, reactivating the scanner. He looked back to
Megatron.
"Well, all the programing is done. But this damn scanner hasn't been
able to lock on to anything." He says, quite frustreted.
